item.title: My remote development tools (part 1) - Docker
item.description: As most of the programs that I am developing are CLI tools or servers, and they don’t feature any Graphical User Interface, I recently started my developing inside Docker containers. As I own some low power server, that is fast and stable enough to handle compiling software inside Docker, I decided that I will host this myself. In this miniseries, I will present how I created my setup, and I will explain why I did those things.
